title: 32-bit Edge VMs to support laptops without hardware virtualization
body: It is completely impossible for a fairly large community of developers to test in Edge at the moment, as only 64-bit VMs are distributed. Even on 64-bit CPUs, you cannot run 64-bit VMs without hardware visualization support; this is still not common on laptops. Please reconsider the decision to lock out developers on year-old hardware from testing Edge, or compatibility of your new browser will suffer.
